statements: SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_date, source_account, destination_account FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE source_account = 'JohnDoe123';
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_id, amount, source_account, destination_account FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT source_account, destination_account, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM financial_transactions GROUP BY source_account, destination_account ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM financial_transactions WHERE source_account = 'account123' OR destination_account = 'account456'
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT account_id, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE currency = 'USD';
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, transaction_date FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, currency FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE currency = 'USD';
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM financial_transactions GROUP BY account_id;
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, amount, transaction_date FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection WHERE detected_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT f.transaction_id, f.flag, f.reason, ft.amount FROM fraud_detection f LEFT JOIN financial_transactions ft ON f.transaction_id = ft.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT amount, transaction_date FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection WHERE is_fraud = TRUE;
SELECT detection_id, detection_time FROM fraud_detection ORDER BY detection_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) FROM financial_transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING SUM(amount) > 5000;
SELECT f.transaction_id, f.amount, fd.is_fraud FROM financial_transactions f JOIN fraud_detection fd ON f.transaction_id = fd.transaction_id WHERE fd.is_fraud = true;
SELECT cm.monitoring_id, cm.monitoring_date, f.amount FROM compliance_monitoring cm JOIN financial_transactions f ON cm.transaction_id = f.transaction_id;
SELECT f.amount, cm.is_compliant FROM financial_transactions f LEFT JOIN compliance_monitoring cm ON f.transaction_id = cm.transaction_id WHERE cm.is_compliant IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings Account';
SELECT merchant_name, merchant_category FROM merchants ORDER BY merchant_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT account_id, COUNT(transaction_id) as transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 5;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, t.transaction_date, a.account_type, m.merchant_name FROM transactions t JOIN accounts a ON t.account_id = a.account_id JOIN merchants m ON t.merchant_id = m.merchant_id WHERE t.amount > 1000;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, t.transaction_date, f.fraud_type FROM transactions t LEFT JOIN fraud_transactions f ON t.transaction_id = f.transaction_id WHERE f.fraud_type = 'chargeback';
SELECT a.account_id, a.account_owner, SUM(t.amount) as total_amount FROM transactions t JOIN accounts a ON t.account_id = a.account_id GROUP BY a.account_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions
SELECT transaction_date, amount, merchant_name FROM financial_transactions WHERE fraud_flag = true
SELECT customer_name, email_address, phone_number FROM customers
SELECT account_number, account_balance FROM accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC
SELECT merchant_name, merchant_category FROM merchants
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT account_id, merchant_name, fraud_flag FROM financial_transactions WHERE merchant_name = 'Amazon' AND fraud_flag = TRUE;

SELECT f.*, a.account_number, c.customer_name FROM financial_transactions f JOIN accounts a ON f.account_id = a.account_id JOIN customers c ON a.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE f.transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT m.merchant_name, COUNT(f.transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM financial_transactions f JOIN merchants m ON f.merchant_name = m.merchant_name GROUP BY m.merchant_name ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, c.email_address, a.account_balance FROM customers c JOIN accounts a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id WHERE a.account_balance < 0;
